Reviews.Title: blackberry
Reviews.Author: Brook
Reviews.Content: This product came just like it said it was. I am very pleased with everything. The phone works great and everything was cleaned off of it, so all I had to do was turn it was. It was an awesome buy!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry curve 2
Reviews.Author: George R.
Reviews.Content: USed phone, worked well. Had a few scratches. Battery had decent life. This was a replacement to my stollen and still on-contract sprint phone. It activated without a problem.

Reviews.Title: Not what I wanted, but company had great customer service
Reviews.Author: ktr
Reviews.Content: I returned this phone, as I needed a phone with a SIM card slot and one that worked in China.  This had neither.  BUT, the company was understanding and returned my money when I explained the problem with the phone.  Great customer service!  Although I won't be buying this phone again, I would work with this company again.

Reviews.Title: its not what i expected
Reviews.Author: tiffiny
Reviews.Content: The battery is horrible, and phone shuts off when using it... I thought the would come in good condition, I have to charge the phone every 2 hours

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Thomas
Reviews.Content: I loved the phone at first but after only 3 months it started rebooting randomly. I took it to the Sprint store and they said the battery was only charging 75% of what it should have been.

Reviews.Title: Appears phone was NOT tested before sale...
Reviews.Author: Lukes Dad "DIY Fixit guy. Why pay someone els...
Reviews.Content: Product listed as in very good condition. Used phone arrived in reasonable appearance . Cheap non rim replacement battery. Had to replace with new battery within 2 weeks.My son informed me the volume control buttons non functional, a few prior txt msg's still on phone. Contacted seller to return but did not return as my son never gave it back to return. Let seller off the on the returnBUT to list as very good condition was misleading. Seller offered another phone at 50% off, no thank you.Pete

Reviews.Title: blackberry
Reviews.Author: Kristi
Reviews.Content: I am having no problems what so ever with my blackberry. The product works very well, and the shipping method was very efficient. He has very good customer service skills, and is very good when dealing with his product. He knows exactly what he is talking about, and treats his customers and his products with respect. Very good phones.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Charlene cole
Reviews.Content: the phone meets all my needs and preformes very well it has good service quility and it doesn't let me down

Reviews.Title: please send me an answer
Reviews.Author: Jhon233
Reviews.Content: how can i know if i can use this smartphone in dominican republic if i can use this please send me an answer my messenger is samanthasuriel@hotmail.com .. and i need what this  someone be inteligent please...

Reviews.Title: Just a little advice
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: The color of the phone is what caught my attention, but I would advise the owner to maybe include a charger. Apparently the one that I had to purchase for that phone didn't work.

Reviews.Title: este telefono esta desbloqueado y tiene ranura de sim card?
Reviews.Author: ssmarmoleto
Reviews.Content: buenos dias necesito que saber si este telefono me sirve en colombia, tecnologia de simcard y que este desbloqueado y disponible para cualquier compañia, este me sirve?

Reviews.Title: Failure to function... rip-off
Reviews.Author: Serious
Reviews.Content: The blackberry do not work(whatsoever). Needless to say I would like my money back.NEGATIVE REVIEW! I took the phone tp the sprint store and the tech expert informed me that something inside the phone was burned out.
